website_summaries.verdict: The IRIScan book 5 WiFi is a wand scanner designed for scanning directly from books, magazines, journals, and notebooks. It's relatively fast and accurate, and allows you to scan directly to a PC, but it would benefit from a longer battery life.
pros: Comes with USB cable, 4GB MiniSD card, and vinyl drawstring carrying case
Easy to set up and use
Capable of scanning directly to a computer

customer_reviews.title: Returned as did not function in the way described
customer_reviews.text: Software download and registration etc easy but product itself very difficult to use and for some reason could only scan a book from binding to edge. Very clumsy to use and rollers did skid on all types f paper,, Sorry we gave this a good try but cannot reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Fenmoor

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I scanned like 1600 pages of staff over 3 days with this thing...it's fine if you need to scan lots of staff likes otherwise a phone with scanning app would make more sense. Battery time is pretty bad, you are looking at 200 pages for 3 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Yinhao He

customer_reviews.title: Good for flat scanning, difficult for books
customer_reviews.text: If this is used for scanning sheets of paper or photos then it is very easy to use. Using it for books where it's difficult to get the page flat is a bit of a technique to master to ensure the scans are readable. Also, if you think you will always have access to the connecting wire to load the scans onto your pc then I wouldn't bother paying the extra for the wifi facility.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine I. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Does not work Crap Software link is dead and never been updated You go in an endless loop Be aware it links to a site to have to pay for the software?????? Get you act together otherwise people will
customer_reviews.author: Anjana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ideal for many books that are not always possible to get, except when seen in library
customer_reviews.author: douglas chapman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good portable scanner , quick to use saves using my large scanner.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A good product that was a bit fiddly to set up initially.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. A. Bennington

customer_reviews.title: Would not even turn on
customer_reviews.text: Nothing happened. Tried a different (new) set of batteries. Nothing. Returned to Amazon for refund. Is there any quality control in this company? I will try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. Peaker

customer_reviews.title: inpressed by the quality of the scan for a mobile ...
customer_reviews.text: inpressed by the quality of the scan for a mobile system and of course can be transported where one wants to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ddraig

customer_reviews.title: Like the Curates egg, good in parts.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little plasticky’, but it does the job, somewhat better than other similar products. VERY sparse instructions, but there is an excellent manual online. Only real drawback is the seeming lack of support for Apple OSX. However the Support given, if you ask, is in my case good (although I did have to point out the link he gave me was for another brand of computer (.exe file) and would not work on a Mac. Next day the correct link was sent.
customer_reviews.author: hcl

customer_reviews.title: The scanner is very good and high quality
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is very good and high quality. Wish they had a 100 DPI option and a WiFi option that was useful. However the Wifi is a mess as it expect you to use the Scanner as a Wifi router so you can download images, this is almost impossible in a busy office as the wifi is used for connecting to the other documents. So you have to download then manually add this to iCloud, OneDrive, DropBox as your device will have no connection to the internet when connected to the scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen O'brien

customer_reviews.title: it fits into a laptop bag easily. I find it very useful on flat sheets ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and portable, it fits into a laptop bag easily. I find it very useful on flat sheets but more difficult on books or magazines where there is a spine. The real problem is battery life. It burns up alkaline batteries with about 15 scans. Rechargeables last about 20 scans. However, you cannot recharge batteries within the scanner as you can with the Anywhere scanner - pity. On the road you would need to carry a plentiful supply of batteries or a rapid charger for AAA batteries. Tony
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tony W Davies

product_meta.title: IRIS - IRIScan Book 5 Portable Color Scanner I Mobile Scanning Device I Fast I DIN A4 I Digitalizes Pages into PDF & JPEG I No Computer needed I Long-life Battery for up to 100 A4 Pages - Black
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Book 5| Colour Name:BlackThe flatbed scanner killer is born!
IRIScan™ Book 5 is a light, autonomous, standalone, high resolution and lithium battery powered portable color scanner that allows you to scan magazines pages, books 
pages or letter & A4 documents such as invoices, contracts or even your favorite recipes. All this without having to rip pages off and damaging original support of document. It’s the world’s fastest portable autonomous scanner with down to 1 sec. scan 
per document. Simply roll your way across the document and your scan will be saved automatically into the provided MicroSD™ card, ready to be transferred onto your PC or Mac. Once back at home, hotel or in the office, the scanned documents are automatically turned into editable documents by the worldwide used I RIS’ flagship OCR software Readiris™
In other words, it offers exactly what a regular flatbed scanner may offervbut scans 
faster, anywhere, on any kind of document supportvwithout damaging it, and without warming up time needed, it gets thevsame image resolution level and all this on the go, without the need of a computer! A new era of scanning just begun, let’s then enjoy this powerful liberty of document capture solution on the go with IRIScan Book!

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Product is sourced and shipped from the European Economic Area (EEA). Product is genuine original from manufacturer authorized distributors.
feature_bullets: DIGITIZE ON THE GO: The world’s fastest book scanner IRIScan Book 5 is the ideal device to digitize books & magazines anytime, anywhere. The bright color screen is perfect for instant scan preview.
SCAN UP TO 100 A4 PAGES DAILY: The IRIScan Book 5 makes it possible to digitize up to 100 A4 pages directly to the included MicroSD Card only with one charge of battery. No computer needed.
PERFECT FOR ANY TYPE OF DOCUMENT: The portable book scanner digitizes every page up to paper size A4. It converts even your scanned documents to audio files, e-Books, PDFs & JPEGs.
SD CARD-SLOT: The lightweight portable book scanner comes with an SD-Card-Slot & an SD-Card. Recharge the mobile digitizer with an USB-Cable (included) to take full advantage of the built-in battery.
INFORMATION: The IRIScan Book 5 with colored display scans documents & notes. It comes with a MicroSD-Slot incl. MicroSD-Card, USB-Slot incl. cable, transport pouch & Software for PC & Mac.
